description: Our Ten Minute Self Build Guides are perfect for anyone wanting to expand their knowledge of the self-build industry, but without going to unnecessary cost or spending time trawling through page after page of waffle. Packed full of information, but compact enough to read while drinking your cup of tea, our guides cover all elements of self-build. Whether you're looking for design inspiration to give your new home or existing home a particular look and feel, or interested in the latest green technology, there's something here for you. Check out our range of Ten Minute Guides below.
name: Ten Minute Guides
